dcterms:creator: A. Amelio
C. Pizzuti
dcterms:description: The Average Common Submatrix measure (ACSM) computes the average area of the largest square sub-matrices in common in two matrices to quantify their similarity.
dcterms:title: Average Common Submatrix measure (ACSM)

dcterms:creator: A. Amelio
dcterms:description: E-ACSM is an approximate and faster version of the Average Common Submatrix measure, which incorporates frequency of matching patterns and restricts matching to a fixed-size neighborhood.
dcterms:title: E-ACSM (E-Average Common Submatrix)

dcterms:creator: A. Amelio
C. Pizzuti
dcterms:description: A patch-based measure for image dissimilarity that evaluates the differences between image patches.
dcterms:title: Patch-based measure for image dissimilarity

dcterms:creator: M. Crochemore
L. Gasieniec
W. Rytter
W. Plandowski
dcterms:description: A method for two-dimensional pattern matching that operates in linear time and uses minimal space.
dcterms:title: Two-dimensional pattern matching

dcterms:creator: J. Ziv
dcterms:description: An axiomatic approach to defining similarity of individual sequences and their classification.
dcterms:title: Similarity of individual sequences
